Ankur Warikoo

Founder nearbuy.com, Mentor, Angel Investor, Public Speaker
New Delhi

Summary
Ankur Warikoo is an entrepreneur, angel investor, mentor and public
speaker, based out of India.
He founded nearbuy.com in 2015 and was the CEO until 2019. Prior
to that, he started the Groupon India business in 2011 and was the
APAC GM, until 2015.

FORTUNE India 40 Under 40 List
India's Top 25 Executives below 40
years (2013)
India's Most Promising Entrepreneur
Award (2013)
ISB Young Leader Award 2005-06

Publications
The Indian Industrial Sector - A
Cleaner Future

He is passionate about public speaking and is often found speaking
at corporates, colleges, schools and conferences - largely on
motivation, leadership, consumer internet and entrepreneurial
mindset.
He is an active angel investor and invests in early stage tech
startups and mentors the founders on Product-Market-Fit, Talent
hiring & retention and the founder mindset.

About Brand "warikoo"
Brand warikoo started in 2016 when Ankur was the CEO of
nearbuy.com
The brand was started primarily to own the story and to create a
brand for potential talent . Due to his love for public speaking Ankur
volunteered for the task and with that, one fine Wednesday, recorded
a video with the title \xe2\x80\x9cif you don\xe2\x80\x99t ask, the answer is always no!\xe2\x80\x9d
He called it \xe2\x80\x9cwarikoo wednesdays\xe2\x80\x9d.
Since then, the brand has grown many folds and is present across
most top social networks. The brand continues to grow largely
through video content, by helping people make choices from a point
of awareness and not ignorance.

Summary
Priyanjit is the co-founder and business head of Codevector Labs, an
Artificial Intelligence based product and services company that aims

workflow
He has also co-founded Logy.AI, an award winning AI platform to
perform diagnosis of diseases, which is democratizing the way rapid
clinical AI models are made
He also consults with government agencies to help strategize on AI
projects
His key skills are in the areas of business development, marketing,
strategy and AI consulting

Summary
Passionate and dexterous individual with an excellent acumen
for software engineering and product management. Have a
demonstrated ability to work on different technical disciplines ranging

working on machine learning and reinforcement learning in Artificial
Learning.
Excellent understanding and previous experience of growth hacking,
network building and PR provides me with an ability to see technical
problems with a business perspective.
